message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll love it. Would you like to buy it from me for $120?
I'm interested in the product, but $120 is a bit high for me. Would you be willing to consider $110?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. I can do $115, but I'm not sure I can go any lower. Would you be willing to meet me at $115?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. However, I'm still a bit hesitant. Would you be willing to meet me at $112?
I can see you're really interested in the product, Bob. I can do $118, but I'm not sure I can go any lower. This is a fair price considering the product's value.
I understand your concerns about the product's value, Alice. However, I'm still looking to save some money. Would you be willing to meet me at $115?
I'm starting to think we're close, Bob. I can do $117, but I'm not sure I can go any lower than that. This is my final offer, so if you're interested, now's the time to make a decision!
